Lines.Line: Welcome to the magical world of
This world is full of powerful wizards.
These wizards are able to wield various elemental spells.
This world is also home to many obstacles that will block your path.
Good thing the wizards are able to use their magical abilities to get rid of these obstacles!
Wait, are you a wizard in training? Well why didn't you say so!
So you're looking to improve your skills and learn more spells?
Lucky for you I know my way around this world! I'll follow you around and tell you what I know.
Well, are you ready to begin your adventure? Lets go!
